job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Develop innovative virtual assistants for both voice and text interactions.
     * Guide the team in leveraging the full capabilities of the Copilot Studio platform.
     * Integrate banking features into virtual assistants to enhance customer service and functionality.
     * Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define project requirements and deliver high-quality solutions.
job_details.full_text:
Senior Copilot Studio Engineer

* Develop innovative virtual assistants for both voice and text interactions.
     * Guide the team in leveraging the full capabilities of the Copilot Studio platform.
     * Integrate banking features into virtual assistants to enhance customer service and functionality.
     * Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define project requirements and deliver high-quality solutions.

profile_classification.rationale: The role focuses on developing virtual assistants using a specific platform (Copilot Studio), integrating features, and enhancing customer service, which aligns with building user-facing applications on generative models. The emphasis on voice and text interactions and platform guidance points towards a GenAI specialization rather than general ML engineering.

phrases: Develop innovative virtual assistants for both voice and text interactions
Integrate banking features into virtual assistants to enhance customer service and functionality
job_tasks.justification: These phrases describe the core activity of building and integrating functionalities into user-facing applications (virtual assistants), which is a key aspect of software development in the context of AI.

These phrases indicate an understanding of how the technical solutions (virtual assistants) contribute to business goals (customer service) and the need to translate business needs into technical requirements.

phrases: Guide the team in leveraging the full capabilities of the Copilot Studio platform
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define project requirements and deliver high-quality solutions
job_tasks.justification: These phrases highlight the need for teamwork, knowledge sharing, and working with diverse groups to achieve project goals.

skills: Guide the team in leveraging the full capabilities of the Copilot Studio platform
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define project requirements and deliver high-quality solutions
Develop innovative virtual assistants for both voice and text interactions
Integrate banking features into virtual assistants to enhance customer service and functionality
